pkgmetadata.longdescription:
The Haskell Platform (HP) is the blessed set of libraries and tools on which to build further Haskell libraries and applications. It is intended to provide a comprehensive, stable, and quality tested base for Haskell projects to work from.
This version specifies the following additional developer tools be installed, for a system to be in full compliance:
* cabal-install * alex * happy * haddock
